name: VoltKnight
description:
Go on a short little quest in the Jungle Dungeon, collecting powerups and increasing your powers along the way! Watch out for those bats though...

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move

Z to attack

For the curious:

- The arrow powerup increases your jump height.

- The feather powerup decreases your falling speed.

- The lightning bolt powerup increases run speed.

- The (badly drawn) magnifying glass increases your view distance.

Also, I'd love to see what time you got - how well did you do? Post it below!
